resources.string: Hello there stranger... You have entered a restricted app! Leave now or face and suffer the consequences! If you wish to ignore this warning hit the ENTER button and your wish shall be granted! Be Warned!

The door behind you has been locked and any attempt of escape will cost you your life. Outside these walls are hungry lions that have not eaten in years! Shall you choose to exit and manage to escape from the lions, then your life shall be spared and consider yourself lucky! You have the option to escape by heading back South, or would you like to continue by going North, East, or West? Within this haunted place is a safe exit, but most rooms are filled with traps. Choose where you go carefully!
Wrong direction you stupid human! Select another direction! Because of such a stupid action, you have lost one life!
Congratulations! You have called my bluff! You are now free to go and have successfully escaped with ease. You are lucky to have not faced all the obstacles. Now leave and never come back!

You are now in the lobby. Don\'t worry human, this is the only place where you are safe. If you see any paranormal creatures, just run back to the lobby and you shall be safe. You have the option to head NORTH, WEST, or EAST. Head SOUTH and face those ravenous lions! You have been warned!

You have entered the basement. As you can see, the dead bodies that were here have all turned to ash. You have the option to stay here or go back and head SOUTH. Trying to go in a different direction will only cost you one life!
